Constructor Detail

Car

public Car(java.lang.String proposedLicense)
Non-default constructor Set transmission type to 'a', odometer instance variable to 50000.5, and minutesParked to 0.

Parameters:
proposedLicence - String validated for assignment to licensePlate.

isParked

public boolean isParked()
Interpreter for minutesParked

Returns:
true when minutesParked == 0. false under all other conditions.

park

public void park(int duration)
Mutator: minutesParked

Parameters:
duration - - the amount of time (minutes) the car was parked.

readOdometer

public java.lang.String readOdometer()
Accessor: odometerInKm

Returns:
odometerInKm + " kilometers" as String

setLicensePlate

public void setLicensePlate(java.lang.String proposedLicense)
Mutator: licensePlate

Parameters:
proposedLicense - String conforming to ICBC length guidelines: http://www.icbc.com/vehicle-registration/licence-plates/pages/personalized-licence-plates.aspx May also be null. The null value represents a car without a plate. If validation fails, null will be set.

setTransmissionType

public void setTransmissionType(char mOrA)
Mutator: transmissionType Must be either 'm' or 'a'. If validation fails, an error message will be printed to the console.

Parameters:
mOrA - char denotes either manual or automatic transmissions
